short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to horizontally flip the contents of a browser tab for use in a teleprompter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I made this extension because I needed to be able to horizontally flip the popped out chat windows from Twitch, YouTube, and more in my teleprompter and I found no way of making windows do that. I got tired of going into dev tools and typing out `document.body.style = "transform: scale(-1)"`.
